_xResult.title: Classic Luxe T-shirt
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom Made T-shirt in Sustainable Bamboo Fabric
_xResult.longdesc:
The "LUXE T-SHIRT" is a luxurious, super-comfortable, double-layered top made with sustainable
bamboo fabric. This T-shirt is delicately handcrafted and has a soft, silky-cashmere feel that provides wonderful next-to-skin comfort.

It’s made with bamboo, which is naturally anti-microbial, hypoallergenic and thermal regulating. Bamboo breathes and wicks moisture away due to its porous nature. Bamboo is also one of nature’s most sustainable resources; it’s 100% biodegradable, naturally regenerative and does not require the use of any pesticides or chemicals to grow.

Look beautiful and feel beautiful in this classic, timeless design that shows the world you are fashion-forward and mindful of the environment. 

  • An elegant essential with a scoop neck and longer length

  • Slim fitting design that hugs your body

  • Half-length sleeves that end just above the elbows

  • 4 way stretch bamboo fabric

  • Double fabric for 2X the protection

  • Breathable, lightweight

  • Seamless finish

Fabric: Sustainable Bamboo Knit - Smooth, soft and light-weight. Bamboo knit is a sustainable fiber made from responsibly harvested bamboo.

Content: 95% Bamboo Rayon, 5% Elastane Spandex

Care: machine cold wash, tumble dry low or hang to dry, do not bleach, steam iron with protective cloth

Colors (in order from left to right on last photo): White, Parfait Pink, Soft Pink, Amethyst, Piscine, Lavender, Blue Chalk, Black.

Model wears color Parfait Pink.

properties.propvalue: Machine cold wash, tumble dry low or hang to dry, do not bleach, steam iron with protective cloth
